snippet: Michelle Obama will remain in Washington when President Xi Jinping of China comes to California this weekend.
abstract: Michelle Obama has said she will remain in Washington during Pres Barack Obama's relationship-building meeting with Pres Xi Jinping of China and will not meet with Xi's wife Peng Liyuan; China experts say first lady's absence is bound to cause disappointment, but Chinese will readily accept family obligations as reason for it.

byline.original: By JACKIE CALMES and JANE PERLEZ
byline.contributor: Jackie Calmes reported from Washington, and Jane Perlez from Beijing.

lead_paragraph: Michelle Obama will remain in Washington when President Xi Jinping of China comes to California this weekend.

headline.main: China’s First Lady Won’t See U.S. Counterpart on Visit
headline.print_headline: China’s First Lady Won’t See U.S. Counterpart on Visit
